his designated successor , saying that the 59-year-old Mr. Volcker was '' very happy '' that Mr. Greenspan was going to take over the board The announcement of a change of leadership at the Fed comes at a delicate time The plunge in the dollar earlier this year is forcing the Fed to put a high priority on defending the greenback lest foreign investors pull foreign investors funds out of the U.S. and precipitate a financial crisis To attract foreign funds
